source:
%%sql
-- Build Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim table  

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim (
    EmployeeHRHierarchyID,
    EmployeeID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    CounterSignManagerID, -- join back on first name and last name
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (order by T3.EmployeeID) AS EmployeeHRHierarchyID,
    T3.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T4.EmployeeID as ManagerEmployeeID,
    NULL AS CounterSignManagerID,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T4.EmployeeID,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.PersNumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T4 ON T1.Pers_No_2 = T4.PersNumber
